title: Waiting for PostgreSQL 16 – Add support for regexps on database and user entries in pg_hba.conf
content: On 24th of October 2022, Michael Paquier committed patch: Add support for regexps on database and user entries in pg_hba.conf   As of this commit, any database or user entry beginning with a slash (/) is considered as a regular expression.
